query:
SELECT
                    timestamp
                FROM
                    miniblocks
                WHERE
                    number = COALESCE(
                        (
                            SELECT
                                MAX(number)
                            FROM
                                miniblocks
                            WHERE
                                l1_batch_number <= $1
                        ),
                        (
                            SELECT
                                MAX(miniblock_number) + 1
                            FROM
                                snapshot_recovery
                            WHERE
                                l1_batch_number = $1
                        )
                    )
